title: The Secret of the Missing Young Lady (Remastered)

infobox.Title:: The Secret of the Missing Young Lady
infobox.Japanese title:: 若奥様が消えた秘密  (Wakaokusama ga Kieta Himitsu?)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ai Haibara  Detective Boys  Osamu Kenzaki
infobox.Animation director:: Seiji Muta (supervisor)  Masatomo Sudo (supervisor)  Kenichi Otomo  Chiemi Hironaka
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Megumi Hayashibara as Ai Haibara  Kousuke Toriumi as Jun Makabe  Junko Asami as Yuri Makabe  Ayumi Sena as Makabe's sister  Isamu Yusen as Milk deliveryman

sections.Situation:
While humming the song "Nazo", Ayumi jogs toward school, but as she passes by the Makabe residence, she sees a man carrying a woman. Both people look injured, and Ayumi, peeking through the bushes, believes the man killed the woman. Ayumi suspects that Jun Makabe is having an affair with a foreign looking woman, evidence from their rather affectionate hug and kiss on the cheek, and they plan to finish off Yuri in the mountain.

Conan, Haibara, and the Detective Boys decided to infiltrate Makabe's residence to find the evidence. True indeed, Ayumi discovers blood splash under the bed. Panic, Ayumi hit her head on the bed and fell unconscious, falling into Jun Makabe's hand.

Jun puts Ayumi in a car and drives her to a mountain. Conan chases after him with his stakeboard, and after confrontation, he knocks Jun out with his soccer kick. It seems Conan captured the culprit, but was there something amiss?
sections.People:
- Victim (?)
- Housewife
- 38 years old
- Yuri's husband
- Half-Japanese musician
- Mysterious woman
- "Happy Everyday!" MILK deliveryman
sections.Resolution: When Jun brought Ayumi into the mountains, he was really taking her to his wife's hospital for treatment and recovery. In addition, the mysterious woman was not, as the Detective Boys surmised, Jun's mistress, but his younger sister, who was likewise worried about her sister-in-law.
sections.Trivia:
- In April 2015, this episode was going to be episode 778.
- Jun Makabe's car is a 2012 red Toyota GT-86 [ZN6]. The license plate number is 新宿 330, ま 20-86 (Shinjuku 330, Ma 20-86).
- The mysterious woman's car is a 2007 dark blue Honda Inspire [CP]. The license plate number is 新宿 301, ま 82-10 (Shinjuku 301, Ma 82-10).
